safe_blocks_description: List of blocks that can be safely replaced. Use minecraft:block_name format.
consume_resources_description: If true, requires dirt/stone/sand in inventory to naturalize terrain
overworld_only_description: If true, staff only works in the Overworld dimension
show_highlight_description: If true, shows visual outline of affected area when holding staff
messy_edge_extension_description: Blocks beyond radius for messy edge (0-3, 0=disabled)
circle_shape_description: If true, uses circular area. If false, uses square area
vegetation_density_description: Vegetation density: NONE, LOW (2.5%), MEDIUM (7.5%), HIGH (15%), VERY_HIGH (30%)
